50 Celebrities Who Have Undergone Gastric Sleeve Surgery

March 22, 2017

#18 Rosie O’Donnell

Known more nowadays for her public beefs than her acting prowess, O’Donnell looks amazing after she underwent gastric surgery. This resulted in her losing 175 pounds! Despite the fact that gastric surgery is controversial, O’Donnell says it’s the best decision she ever made.
